sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: As hospitals struggle to cope with the rising coronavirus infections across the continent, national governments are under pressure to introduce tighter restrictions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Olaf Scholz's SPD party give its seal of approval for the traffic-like coalition government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Thousands take to the streets in Serbia to demand better environmental protections from the government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: At least one person has died after Indonesia's Mount Semeru erupted Saturday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Emergency services in Java are continuing evacuations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: 49,000 new coronavirus infections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This is the number of cases that were identified in France on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: As medics across the country struggle to support some 2,000 patients in critical care, the pressure is on for the government to introduce tighter measures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile in Germany, two days after leaders announced a lockdown for the unvaccinated, outgoing Chancellor Angela Merkel made what was likely her final appeal before leaving office.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: ANGELA MERKEL, Chancellor of the United States of America We are in the middle of this fourth wave of the pandemic and in a very serious situation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In some parts of our country, it can only be called dramatic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Intensive care units are overcrowded.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Critically ill people are being flown across Germany to get the care they need. And day by day, a terribly high number of lives are claimed by the virus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: While Italy has done well to delay the fourth wave, the infection rate is rising.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Shoppers in Rome will now be required to wear masks in outdoor spaces to contain the spread of the virus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Finally, in Vienna, where the lockdown is proving to be increasingly unpopular, 40,000 people marched on the capital, protesting the measures and the government's plan to make vaccines mandatory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Crowds of people wearing face masks packed into the new Taipei City Hall Square to watch the opening of Christmasland, Taiwan's largest outdoor festive decoration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The island has so far managed to control the spread of COVID-19 by closing its borders to foreign nationalities and by using contact tracing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Residents were able to enjoy the festivities as many countries grapple with a surge of new infections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: German Chancellor-designate Olaf Scholz is one step closer to officially taking over from Angela Merkel after his own SPD party gave its overwhelming approval for a deal to form a new government with the Greens and the Free Democratic Party.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Dubbed the traffic light coalition, it will be the first time all three parties will jointly rule Germany. Speaking at the SPD Congress on Saturday, Schulz said, Progress.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: That's what distinguishes us, the SPD, the Greens and the FDP.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And that also distinguishes us from others who sit on the opposite benches of the German Bundestag, seeing that we have ideas, that we actually want to see them through.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Although now understood to be just a formality, Scholz faces three more votes before he can take over as Chancellor. Green Party approval, FDP approval and the German Parliament approval.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Pope Francis has arrived in Athens for the second leg of his five-day tour of Cyprus

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: and Greece.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This trip will centre on strengthening renewed ties between the Vatican and the Greek Orthodox Church. Discussions on climate change and the plight of asylum seekers on Europe's borders also feature high on the Pontiff's agenda.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: However, first on the day's itinerary was a meeting with President Catriona Sakilaropoulou. Without Athens and Greece, Europe and the world would not be what they are.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They would be less wise and less happy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This welcoming country has seen a number of migrant brothers and sisters arrive to some of its islands, superior to the inhabitants themselves, increasing the inconveniences that are influencing the economic crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In addition, the pontiff took no prisoners when criticising Europe's nationalist agenda.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The European community, torn by nationalistic selfishness, sometimes appears closed and uncoordinated instead of being the driving force of solidarity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: I would like to push a global vision once again, a community vision, in front of the migrant issue, and encourage us to pay attention to the most needy, so that they are welcomed and can benefit from the possibilities each country has to offer." Before his afternoon appointments, the head of the Catholic Church was welcomed by the Prime Minister.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The members of the Society of Jesus will later host His Holiness at the Apostolic Nunciature of Athens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Traffic in Serbia was almost paralyzed for more than two hours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Protesters blocked the main international highway that goes through the capital, as well as bridges and main roads in other Serbian cities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The discontent of those gathered is mainly directed at the president of Serbia, Aleksandar Vucic, but also at the mining company Rio Tinto, which is preparing to dig for lithium in a project that's been controversial for almost two decades. Many fear that the government recently amended the laws on referendum and expropriation in order to facilitate the lithium mining, which environmentalists say would cause irreparable damage to the environment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Don't build Rio Tinto. Don't poison my children and my grandchildren. To whom are we leaving this country? I love this country very much and I'm here to defend my children and my grandchildren and the country. I love this country very much and I'm here to defend my children and my grandchildren and the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It doesn't matter who is in power. It doesn't matter who makes the decisions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Only the environment matters. And we really don't want this.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This is just a civil uprising against what is happening.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It was the second such nationwide protest called by eco-groups and supported by a number of the opposition parties, with the main demand being the withdrawal of the disputed laws.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Last Saturday, the protesters skirmished with police and in one town, unidentified masked men attacked them with sticks and hammers. Fewer incidents occurred this time, while the authorities claim that actions of the protesters are illegal because of the main road's blockade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Everything that is happening here is against the law and above all what the authorities are doing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: So the blockade of highways is as illegal as the law on expropriation and on the seizure of private property.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: So no one would go crazy to block highways all over Serbia if there was a law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: All this is caused by one absolute lawlessness that this government is implementing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We have come to stand up, together with the citizens, against everything that is happening in our country. I think the reasons for this protest are dissatisfaction with how Serbia is developing and how the regime of the Serbian Progressive Party is behaving and governing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This is one of the most important traffic points not only in the capital but also in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The demonstrators who were here today said that they will be here every weekend until their demands are met.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Stefan Goranovic, Euronews, Belgrade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A blanket of smouldering ash, lava and a haze of poisonous fog have engulfed what remains

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: of this bridge in Java's Lumajang district. Mount Semeru, on Indonesia's most densely populated island, suddenly erupted on Saturday morning, sending thick plumes of hot ash some 15,000 feet into the air.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: As the clouds of ash continue to block out the sun, many villages have been plunged into darkness. While Mount Semeru regularly spews hot ash, Darwin's Volcanic Ash Advisory Centre says airlines might be forced to divert their flight paths. At least one person has died While Mount Semeuru regularly spews hot ash, Darwin's Volcanic Ash Advisory Centre says airlines might be forced to divert their flight paths.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: At least one person has died as Java's emergency units struggle to attend to the hordes of unlucky local residents suffering burns.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Persisting rain is fused with burning debris and lava creating piping hot rivers of mud, which continue to hinder evacuation efforts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In 2013, a mountaineer taking on their arduous journey up Mont Blanc stumbled across a treasure that had been hidden underneath the snow and ice for decades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: He found a box of precious stones linked to a 1966 plane crash on the mountain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The mountaineer discovered a box of treasures, including other goods, and we are about to open it and go through it now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Establishing ownership of the finding has been an ongoing issue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Lacking any claim after eight years, the law states that half of the treasure goes to the discoverer and the other half goes to the state.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And on Friday, that deadline was passed, and the mountaineer was informed that he would be receiving his share, estimated to be worth 150,000 euro.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Wishing to remain anonymous, the mountaineer said, I didn't believe it would happen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's really too much.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: I'm going to put it into an account without going overboard.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It is thought the 6,000 pieces of precious stones originated from a dealer who was travelling on the Air India flight before tragedy struck.
